biotools.summary: Drugmonizome-ML is a tool for creating a custom machine learning pipeline on top of the Drugmonizome drug set libraries and SEP-L1000 phenotypic datasets in order to predict novel indications or attributes for existing drugs and understudied small molecules.

bioschemas.name: Drugmonizome-ML
bioschemas.summary: Drugmonizome-ML is a tool for creating a custom machine learning pipeline on top of the Drugmonizome drug set libraries and SEP-L1000 phenotypic datasets in order to predict novel indications or attributes for existing drugs and understudied small molecules.
